com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.physical

Class AbstractPhysicalTopologyMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.physical.AbstractPhysicalTopologyMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDistributedApplicationRegistry, IPhysicalTopology, IPhysicalTopologyMonitor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractStarTopologyMonitor, CentralizedTopologyMonitor

    public abstract class AbstractPhysicalTopologyMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPhysicalTopologyMonitor
    Provides support for the listener infrastructure required by a topology monitor.
    Author:
    dawood

      • addPeerListener

        public boolean addPeerListener(IApplicationDescriptor app,
                      IPhysicalTopologyListener l)
        Description copied from interface: IPhysicalTopologyMonitor
        Add a listener to receive notifications of new or removed application peers. Notifications concerning the addition/removal of the given app must not be sent.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        newApp -

      • notifyNameSpacePopulationChange

        protected void notifyNameSpacePopulationChange(java.util.List<IApplicationDescriptor> newApps,
                                   boolean peersOnly)
        Notify all peers in this JVM that the set of peers in the name space of the given descriptors has changed. This should be called by the subclass whenever the population for the name space has changed. This in turn calls callListeners(IApplicationDescriptor) for the peers of the descriptor and, if the flag is unset, then the given instances.
        Parameters:
        newApps - the application descriptor used to identify peer applications to notify.
        peersOnly - if set, then only notify the peers of the given apps, and not the given apps.

      • callListeners

        protected void callListeners(IApplicationDescriptor appDesc)
        Calls the listeners that have been registered by the given app.
        Parameters:
        appDesc -
